collection_holder_name: Ralph B. Draughon Library, Auburn University Libraries
pageContext.collection_description: Contains correspondence, legal and financial documents, business records, copies of patents, scientific journal articles, recording equipment and blueprints, pamphlets, scrapbooks, church records, tape recorded sermons and speeches. Includes Orr's work at WAPI, his founding of WJHO, Opelika, AL and his role as a pioneer in the "electronic church" of the 1950s advocating the use of radio and television by Methodists.
